Plot: A Catholic school principal questions a priest's ambiguous relationship with a troubled young student.
Title: Doubt
Writer: John Patrick Shanley (screenplay), John Patrick Shanley (play)
Actors: Meryl Streep, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Amy Adams, Viola Davis
tomatoConsensus: Doubt succeeds on the strength of its top-notch cast, who successfully guide the film through the occasional narrative lull.
Awards: Nominated for 5 Oscars. Another 26 wins & 88 nominations.
